actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The snake makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: *Melee Attack Roll:* +6, reach 10 ft. *Hit:* 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: *Strength Saving Throw:* DC 14, one Large or smaller creature the snake can see within 10 feet. *Failure:* 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14).
